user.reset_password:
You have reset your password.
You have lost decryption keys for your previous private spaces.
If you had exported your vault backup from workspace ‚ÄúMy account‚Äù, you could retrieve them by restauring the backup.
user.create_identity:
Welcome to Misakey!
This first space is for you to discover the application.
To create your own private spaces, you will have to setup your password.
user.create_account:
Hey {{displayName}}!
You can now create your own private spaces and share it.
Decryption keys of your private space are stored in your vault. Access to the vault fully depends on your current password, it is important for you not to lose it because Misakey haven't access to it and can't help you to retrieve it.
You can download a backup of your vault from the workspace ‚ÄúMy account‚Äù, store it in a safe place, you could use it later to retrieve access to your private space, in case of password reset.

dialog.title: Renew access link
dialog.description:
Are you sure you want to renew this private space's access link?
Previous link will be revoked.

dialog.title: Send a message to {{displayName}}
dialog.subtitle:
A private space is going to be created between you and {{displayName}}.
{{displayName}} will appear as a member when he or she would have accepted to join the private space.
